verses.text: In that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* there shall be a \w fountain|strong="H4726"\w* \w opened|strong="H6605"\w* to the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* and to the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* for \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* and for \w uncleanness|strong="H5079"\w*.\f + \fr 13.1 \ft uncleanness: Heb. separation for uncleanness\f*

¶ And it shall come to pass in that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, \add that\add* I will cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* the \w names|strong="H8034"\w* of the \w idols|strong="H6091"\w* out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and they shall no more be \w remembered|strong="H2142"\w*: and also I will cause the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* and the \w unclean|strong="H2932"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* to \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

And it shall come to pass, \add that\add* when \w any|strong="H0376"\w* shall yet \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w*, then his \w father|strong="H0001"\w* and his \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* that \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* him shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Thou shalt not \w live|strong="H2421"\w*; for thou \w speakest|strong="H1696"\w* \w lies|strong="H8267"\w* in the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: and his \w father|strong="H0001"\w* and his \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* that \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* him shall \w thrust|strong="H1856"\w* him through when he \w prophesieth|strong="H5012"\w*.

And it shall come to pass in that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \add that\add* the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* shall be \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w* every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* of his \w vision|strong="H2384"\w*, when he hath \w prophesied|strong="H5012"\w*; neither shall they \w wear|strong="H3847"\w* a \w rough|strong="H8181"\w* \w garment|strong="H0155"\w* to \w deceive|strong="H3584"\w*:\f + \fr 13.4 \ft a rough…: Heb. a garment of hair\f*\f + \fr 13.4 \ft deceive: Heb. lie\f*

But he shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, I \add am\add* no \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*, I \add am\add* an \w husbandman|strong="H0376"\w*; for \w man|strong="H0120"\w* taught me to keep \w cattle|strong="H7069"\w* from my \w youth|strong="H5271"\w*.

And \add one\add* shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, What \add are\add* these \w wounds|strong="H4347"\w* in thine \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*? Then he shall \w answer|strong="H0559"\w*, \add Those\add* with which I was \w wounded|strong="H5221"\w* \add in\add* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of my \w friends|strong="H0157"\w*.

¶ \w Awake|strong="H5782"\w*, O \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, against my \w shepherd|strong="H7462"\w*, and against the \w man|strong="H1397"\w* \add that is\add* my \w fellow|strong="H5997"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*: \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* the \w shepherd|strong="H7462"\w*, and the \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* shall be \w scattered|strong="H6327"\w*: and I will \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* mine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* upon the little \w ones|strong="H6819"\w*.

And it shall come to pass, \add that\add* in all the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w parts|strong="H6310"\w* therein shall be cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* \add and\add* \w die|strong="H1478"\w*; but the \w third|strong="H7992"\w* shall be \w left|strong="H3498"\w* therein.

And I will \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* the third \w part|strong="H7992"\w* through the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, and will \w refine|strong="H6884"\w* them as \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* is \w refined|strong="H6884"\w*, and will \w try|strong="H0974"\w* them as \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* is \w tried|strong="H0974"\w*: they shall \w call|strong="H7121"\w* on my \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, and I will \w hear|strong="H6030"\w* them: I will \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, It \add is\add* my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: and they shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.
